titel: Spacious land for Sale in Arad in a beautiful neighborhood
description:
The land is in the middle of a quiet friendly neighborhood near a newly constructed intersection, the land in very spacious and close to many facilities including;

- A School
- Lulu Hypermarket 
- Airport 
- Main highway 

The location of the land is highly wanted due to the convince of the location, Arad is a very popular area and the percentage of interest in this area rises day by day which raises its value significantly.

The land is very convenient for constructing a new residential building regardless of exterior design, all dependent on you, very spacious in terms of area, the possibilities are endless in an engineering perspective.

Everything needed to live in comfort is nearby; Jack's, a very popular restaurant known for its authentic Italian style pizzas is only 6 minutes away from you, that's just an insight from the many amazing facilities near you.

titel: Land for Sale in Prime Tubli Location, Bahrain
description:
Land for Sale in the Heart of Bahrain (Tubli)

We are offering a fantastic opportunity to own land in the central and vibrant area of Tubli. This land spans 798 sqm, making it ideal for those looking to build a dream home in a peaceful yet strategic location. With easy access to key services, amenities, and major roads, Tubli offers the perfect balance of convenience and tranquility.

Features:
- Land area: 798 sqm.
- Price per square foot: 22 BHD.
- Total price: 175,560 BHD.
- Zoning: RA (Residential Private).

This land is classified as residential private, making it suitable for constructing a private home with ample space for a comfortable living environment. The location is highly sought-after, ensuring potential long-term value. Whether you're looking to create your dream home or make a secure investment, this land is an ideal choice.

Don’t miss this rare opportunity to own land in such a prime location. Contact us today for more information or to reserve this plot.

titel: Premium Residential Land  in Jiblat Habshi
description:
For Sale: Premium Residential Land in Jiblat Habshi

Land Size: 270 SQM  
Zoning: RA Residential  
Price per SQM: BD 34.5  
Total Price: BD 100,000  

About Jiblat Habshi:

Located in the heart of Bahrain, Jiblat Habshi is a serene residential area that offers a peaceful environment while still being close to all essential services. With easy access to major roads, it provides a perfect balance of tranquility and convenience. The area is well-equipped with schools, retail outlets, healthcare facilities, and leisure spots, making it ideal for families.

Jiblat Habshi is the perfect place for those seeking a calm yet connected lifestyle, with easy access to all the city’s amenities.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

titel: Residential (SP) | 33.2 BHD Per FT
description:
Diyar Al Muharraq is a prominent master-planned development located on 1,200 hectares of reclaimed land off the northern coast of Bahrain. Since its inception in 2006, the project has been designed to meet Bahrain's growing residential and commercial needs, offering a harmonious blend of modern living and traditional Bahraini culture. 
AECOM

Key Features of Diyar Al Muharraq:

Residential Diversity: The development offers a wide range of housing options, from luxurious villas to modern apartments, catering to various preferences and lifestyles.

Commercial and Retail Hubs: Strategically located commercial spaces and retail centers provide residents with convenient access to shopping, dining, and entertainment venues.

Educational and Healthcare Facilities: Diyar Al Muharraq is equipped with top-tier educational institutions and healthcare centers, ensuring residents have access to essential services within the community.

Green Spaces and Recreational Areas: The development emphasizes a balanced lifestyle by incorporating parks, waterfronts, and open areas for leisure and recreation.

Infrastructure and Accessibility: Well-planned road networks and connectivity to major highways make commuting to and from Diyar Al Muharraq seamless.

Investing in land within Diyar Al Muharraq presents a unique opportunity to be part of a thriving community that combines modern amenities with cultural authenticity. The area's strategic location, comprehensive infrastructure, and diverse property offerings make it an attractive choice for both investors and future residents

titel: Great Investment Opportunity | Prime Location
description:
Land for Sale – Prime Corner Plot in Gudaibiya
An excellent investment opportunity to own a residential plot in one of the most vibrant areas of Gudaibiya. Located on the corner of three streets, offering great exposure and development potential.

Plot Area: 237.8 sqm (2,559.6 sqft)

Zoning: RHB (Residential – Three Floors Allowed)

Price: BHD 130,000

Key Features:
Corner plot facing three streets, ideal for development.

Located in a high-density residential and commercial area.

Directly opposite one of the most popular parks in the area.

Close to Al Qasr Avenue and public transportation.

Easy access to schools, shops, and all essential services.

Why this plot is a great investment:
Prime location in a well-populated and sought-after neighborhood.

Perfect for developing rental units or a private residence.

High demand for housing in this central Manama location.

Looking for more real estate opportunities?

titel: Exclusiv Lake View Land for Sale in AmwajIsland
description:
هذه القطعة الجميلة من الأرض المعروضة للبيع في جزيرة أمواج نجمة هي فرصة نادرة لامتلاك عقار فاخر في أحد أكثر المواقع المرغوبة في البحرين. تقع الأرض على البحيرة الهادئة ، وتوفر بيئة مثالية لأولئك الذين يقدرون الخصوصية والجمال الطبيعي والبيئة الهادئة. يضم مكان الإقامة أيضًا شاطئًا خاصًا ، مما يجعله مكانًا مثاليًا للسباحة وحمامات الشمس والأنشطة المائية.

مساحة الأرض المعروضة للبيع كبيرة بما يكفي لبناء فيلا واسعة ، مع ترك مساحة واسعة للمناظر الطبيعية والأنشطة الخارجية. يقع العقار في منطقة هادئة وسلمية ، بعيدًا عن صخب المدينة ، ومع ذلك لا يزال يسهل الوصول إليه من جميع وسائل الراحة والمرافق.

This beautiful piece of land for sale in Amwaj Najma Island is a rare opportunity to own a premium property in one of the most sought-after locations in Bahrain. The land is situated on the tranquil lake, providing an idyllic setting for those who value privacy, natural beauty, and a serene environment. The property also boasts a private beach, making it a perfect spot for swimming, sunbathing, and water activities.

The land area for sale is large enough to build a spacious villa or mansion, with ample space left for landscaping and outdoor activities. The property is located in a quiet and peaceful area, away from the hustle and bustle of the city, yet still within easy reach of all amenities and facilities.

titel: Land For Sale | Al Sayah | Busaiteen | 244.4 ssqm
description:
Residential Land for Sale in a Prime Location in Busaiteen.

A golden opportunity to own a residential land in one of Bahrain’s most vibrant and serene areas. Busaiteen is known for its strategic location, proximity to essential services, and a perfect blend of modern living and tranquility.

Property Details:
• Land Size: 2630.70 sqft.
• Classification: RB.
• Price per sqft: BD 37
• Total Price: BHD 97,300 

Key Features:
• Located near main roads, offering flexible design options and added privacy.
• Perfect for building a luxury villa or a family residence.
• Prime location in Busaiteen, close to AL SAYAH PETROL STATION and YOUSAF BIN AL HASSAN MOSQUE
• Schools and healthcare facilities.
• Shopping malls and commercial areas.
• Major highways for easy access to all parts of Bahrain.
• Peaceful and family-friendly neighborhood.

Why Choose Busaiteen?
Busaiteen is one of Bahrain’s top residential areas, renowned for its charm, proximity to key landmarks, and availability of all essential amenities.

titel: Residential (SP) | 39.5 BHD Per FT
description:
Hidd, located in the southeastern part of Muharraq Island in Bahrain, is a region that seamlessly blends historical significance with modern development. Spanning approximately 15 square kilometers, Hidd is home to over 14,500 residents. The area showcases a mix of traditional architecture reflecting its rich cultural heritage and contemporary structures, including luxurious towers.

Strategically positioned, Hidd is adjacent to key areas such as East Hidd Housing City, Arad, Qalali, and Amwaj Island, making it easily accessible and well-connected. The town has undergone significant expansion due to land reclamation projects, enhancing its potential as a vital trade hub within Bahrain and the broader Gulf Cooperation Council region. This development has attracted numerous projects aimed at further growth and investment in the area.

Given its strategic location, ongoing development projects, and rich cultural backdrop, Hidd presents a compelling opportunity for land investment. The area's blend of historical charm and modern infrastructure makes it an attractive destination for both residential and commercial ventures.

Property Details:

* Land Type: Residential (SP)
* Land Size: 365 SQM
* Price: BHD 39.5 per F2
* Total Price: BHD 155,000


Landmarks:

- Nearby the sea
- Easy access to main roads
- Nearby Essential services, cafes and restaurants

titel: Freehold Land Dilmunia - Residential & Commercial
description:
Discover an exceptional opportunity to own a piece of Dilmunia Island! This prime freehold land, measuring 1207.7 square meters, is available for sale at a competitive price of 389,991 BHD. With a rate of 30 BHD per square foot, this versatile plot is perfect for both residential and commercial development.

Dilmunia Island is renowned for its holistic wellness and luxury living, featuring landmarks such as the Dilmunia Health District, Dilmunia Paradise, The Treasure, and The Lagoon Park. Whether you envision a serene residential retreat or a thriving commercial venture, this land offers endless possibilities in a prestigious location.

Nearby amenities include:
•	Dilmunia Mall: Modern shopping center with retail stores, dining options, and entertainment facilities (approx. 5 minutes by car).
•	Dilmunia Health District: Spas, fitness centers, and medical services (approx. 5 minutes by car).
•	Nadeen School Dilmunia: State-of-the-art educational institution (approx. 5 minutes by car).
•	Dilmunia Paradise: Swimming pools and waterfalls (approx. 5 minutes by car).
•	Sama Bay: Luxurious waterfront development (approx. 7 minutes by car).
•	Amwaj Islands: Recreational activities, restaurants, cafes, and beautiful beaches (approx. 10 minutes by car).
•	The Lagoon Park: Waterfront dining and leisure activities (approx. 10 minutes by car).
•	Bahrain International Airport: Easy access for international travelers (approx. 15 minutes by car).

For more inquiries Call/WhatsApp Ali Hussain at +973 39978758.
Pegasus Real Estate prioritizes client satisfaction.

Four main malls, all of which cater to various types of markets: Dragon City Bahrain for wholesale and retail Chinese products, Souq Al Baraha as the ode to Arabian traditional markets, 

the Thai Mart, 
and the Marassi Galleria for all things related to shopping, entertainment, weekend activities, and a wide array of dining options.

This land is in an excellent location, offering easy access to key amenities and major roads, making it ideal for building your dream home. The plot is perfectly suited for residential construction, with ample space for a spacious villa or family home. Its strategic location ensures both privacy and convenience, making it an attractive opportunity for buyers looking to invest in a peaceful yet well-connected neighborhood.

titel: Prime - Final Permit Available for 10 Villas
description:
Residential Land with final Permission for 10 villas Project, located at a prime location in Saar area within 2-3 minutes drive to Saar Mall. 

A new level of luxury living at La Villas at Serenity Saar, an 
exclusive enclave of 10 modern, state-of-the-art villas nestled in a 
serene and picturesque setting.

Luxury Living:

Each of the 10 villas at Serenity Saar is a masterpiece of modern design, 
featuring the latest in luxury amenities and finishes. With open-concept 
layouts, floor-to-ceiling windows, and private outdoor spaces, these villas 
are designed to bring the outdoors in and maximize your living space

Each villa features:

 4 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms
 Gourmet kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances
 Spacious living and dining areas
 Private outdoor space with pool and spa2-car garage
 Smart home technology
 Energy-efficient features

Amenities :

Residents of La Villas at Serenity Saar will enjoy access to a wide range 
of amenities, including:
 Gated Community
 24-hour security
 Service Center
 Outdoor lounge and Children's playground

Location :

Located in the heart of Saar, yet surrounded by lush greenery and tranquil 
water features, La Villas at Serenity Saar offer the best of both worlds. 
With easy access to all the amenities and attractions of the city, yet tucked 
away in a peaceful oasis, you'll have the perfect balance of convenience 
and tranquility.

location: Al Sidra, Diyar Al Muharraq, Muharraq Governorate
titel: Free Hold | Corner Land | Al-Sidra
description:
Overview: Discover an exceptional opportunity to invest in a prime corner plot of land in the prestigious Al-Sidra project at Diyar Al Muharraq. This freehold land is perfect for building your dream private villa.

Key Features:

Ideal Location: Nestled in the heart of Al-Sidra, this plot offers a serene environment and is just 15 minutes from Bahrain International Airport. Enjoy easy access to popular attractions like Dragon City, Amwaj Islands, and Marassi Beach.
-Corner Plot: Benefit from added privacy and versatility, with ample space for landscaping and design creativity.
-Classification: Classified under RHA, this land is specifically designated for constructing a private villa, allowing you to create a home tailored to your lifestyle.
-Freehold Ownership: Enjoy full ownership, providing peace of mind for future development and investment.

Why Al-Sidra? Al-Sidra is known for its vibrant community, blending tranquility and convenience with well-planned infrastructure, green spaces, and easy access to essential amenities like schools and hospitals.

Investment Potential: With increasing demand for residential properties in Diyar Al Muharraq, this plot presents a fantastic investment opportunity in a thriving community.

Contact Information: For more details or to schedule a viewing, please contact us today. Don’t miss this unique chance to create your ideal home in Al-Sidra!

titel: Lowest Price | Najma Island | Free-Hold
description:
Are you searching for the perfect canvas to build your dream home? Look no further! Nestled within the serene beauty of Najma Island in Amwaj, we proudly present an exceptional opportunity: a spacious 1098 square meter land awaiting your vision.

Key Features:

Prime Location: Situated on Najma Island, this land offers the epitome of tranquility while being conveniently close to all amenities. Embrace the island lifestyle with breathtaking views and serene surroundings.

Unbeatable Price: At the lowest price in the market, this is an unparalleled opportunity to invest in your future. Don't miss out on securing this valuable piece of land at an incredibly affordable rate.

Ready for Development: This freehold plot is ready for immediate development. Whether you envision a cozy retreat or a luxurious mansion, this land is poised to bring your vision to life.

Accessible Ownership: As a freehold plot, ownership is open to anyone, making this an accessible opportunity for both investors and homeowners alike.

Don't let this opportunity slip away. Contact us today to learn more about this exceptional land on Najma Island. Build the home you've always dreamed of in one of Amwaj's most coveted locations. Take the first step towards a brighter future today!

location: Essence of Dilmunia, Dilmunia Island, Muharraq Governorate
titel: Freehold Land For Sale Next to Dilmunia Mall
description:
A #Freehold corner plot for sale in #Dilmunia Island with private road with external parking spaces, overseeing the sea and Dilmunia #Mall with higher elevation level. The plot is perfect for building your future house with spacious garden. 

 Dilmunia Island offers a Health District (DHD), spread over 165,000 m2 of land and will form the focal point of the island and position Dilmunia as a health and wellbeing landmark within the Middle East providing preventive, promotive, curative and rehabilitative services with a wide range of alternative treatments and wellness.
Situated in the heart of the Arabian Gulf, Dilmunia lies off the north-eastern coast of the Island of Muharraq, Bahrain. Its proximity to the @Bahrain International @Airport and easy accessibility to King Fahad Causway provides developers with a location well-connected to the prosperous GCC community at large, as well as internal transportation links to residential, commercial and industrial development zones.

titel: Residential (SP) 30.2 BHD Per FT
description:
Diyar Al Muharraq is a prominent master-planned development located on 1,200 hectares of reclaimed land off the northern coast of Bahrain. Since its inception in 2006, the project has been designed to meet Bahrain's growing residential and commercial needs, offering a harmonious blend of modern living and traditional Bahraini culture. 


Property Details:

* Land Type: Residential (SP)
* Land Size: 277.5 SQM
* Price: BD 30.2 per FT
* Total Price: BD 90,000


Landmarks:

- Nearby Canadian School
- Easy access to main roads
- Nearby essential services, cafes and restaurants.


Key Features of Diyar Al Muharraq:

Residential Diversity: The development offers a wide range of housing options, from luxurious villas to modern apartments, catering to various preferences and lifestyles.

Commercial and Retail Hubs: Strategically located commercial spaces and retail centers provide residents with convenient access to shopping, dining, and entertainment venues.

Educational and Healthcare Facilities: Diyar Al Muharraq is equipped with top-tier educational institutions and healthcare centers, ensuring residents have access to essential services within the community.

Green Spaces and Recreational Areas: The development emphasizes a balanced lifestyle by incorporating parks, waterfronts, and open areas for leisure and recreation.

Infrastructure and Accessibility: Well-planned road networks and connectivity to major highways make commuting to and from Diyar Al Muharraq seamless.

Investing in land within Diyar Al Muharraq presents a unique opportunity to be part of a thriving community that combines modern amenities with cultural authenticity. The area's strategic location, comprehensive infrastructure, and diverse property offerings make it an attractive choice for both investors and future residents

titel: | Land For Sale | Prime Location | Residential SP|
description:
Diyar Al Muharraq is one of the most attractive real estate developments in Bahrain, offering several advantages in order to live there. Below's  are some key highlights of Diyar Al Muharraq:
Landmarks:


Property Details:

- Land Type: Residential (SP)
- Land Size: 502.1 SQM
- Roads: 1
- Price: BHD 30.6 per FT²

- Selling Price: BHD 165.000

- Nearby Dragon city
- Easy access to main roads
- Nearby essential services, cafes and restaurants

Key highlights:

1. Prime Location
Located in the northeast of Muharraq, Diyar Al Muharraq is well-connected to key areas of Bahrain, including 
Manama, Bahrain International Airport, and major highways.

2. Modern Infrastructure & Planning
A well-planned master community with top-notch infrastructure, including wide roads, utilities, and green spaces.

A mix of residential, commercial, and hospitality projects, making it a self-sufficient city.

3. High Demand & Investment Potential
Diyar Al Muharraq is one of the most sought-after locations for investors and homebuyers in Bahrain.

Freehold ownership is available for both Bahrainis and expatriates, attracting international buyers.

4. Luxury & Affordable Housing Options
Offers a variety of developments, from affordable housing to luxury waterfront villas, attracting different buyer segments

5. Commercial & Business Opportunities
Ideal for business investors due to the presence of malls, retail spaces, and office buildings.

Marassi Galleria and Dragon City provide vibrant shopping and business hubs.

titel: Residential (B3) | 29.4 BHD Per FT
description:
Saar is a distinguished residential area in Bahrain, located west of the capital, Manama. Known for its lush greenery and tranquil environment, Saar offers a blend of luxury and comfort, making it a sought-after location for both locals and expatriates.

Saar is renowned for its upscale residential properties, including spacious villas and modern apartments. The area is particularly popular among families due to its peaceful ambiance and proximity to essential amenities. The presence of reputable educational institutions, such as St. Christopher's School and the University College of Bahrain, adds to its attractiveness for residents seeking quality education for their children.

Proximity to El Mercado Mall

Located nearby, El Mercado Mall in Janabiya serves as a convenient shopping and dining destination for Saar residents. This neighborhood market offers a variety of retail outlets, restaurants, and cafes, catering to diverse tastes and preferences. The mall's design harmoniously blends with the local character, providing a comfortable and accessible environment for daily needs and leisure activities.


Property Details:

* Land Type: Residential (B3)
* Land Size: 459 SQM
* Price: BHD 29.4 per F2
* Total Price: BHD 145,000


Landmarks:

- Nearby EL Mercado Mall
- Easy access to main roads
- Nearby a convenient shopping, cafes and restaurants

titel: Residential (RHA) | 31.7 BHD Per FT
description:
Buying land in Malkiya, Bahrain, can offer several benefits:

Strategic Location: Malkiya is situated on the northwest coast of Bahrain, 
providing easy access to High way, main roads , major cities and amenities in Bahrain
offering proximity to both urban areas and scenic natural surroundings, ideal for residential or commercial projects.



Property Details:

* Land Type: Residential (RHA)
* Land Size: 176.2 SQM
* Price: BHD 31.7 per FT
* Total Price: BHD 60,000


Landmarks:
- Easy access to High way and main roads
- Nearby convenient shopping, cafes and restaurants.



Investment Potential: Bahrain’s real estate market has shown growth, and land in emerging areas like Malkiya can appreciate over time, offering a good return on investment.


Access to Amenities: Malkiya provides easy access to local amenities like schools, shops, and recreational areas, balancing convenience with tranquility.

Tourism Appeal: As a growing tourism destination, Malkiya is poised for future demand in hospitality and related industries, which could drive land value up.

Long-Term Value: Land generally appreciates over time, especially in less developed or upcoming areas, offering good long-term financial growth.

These factors make Malkiya a good option for land investment.

Key Features of Al Hidd:

Strategic Location:

Proximity to Bahrain International Airport and connectivity to Manama via the Shaikh Khalifa Causeway enhance its accessibility. 


Why Choose This Land?

- Prime location near Lulu Hypermarket
- Easy access to main roads
- Surrounded by cafes, restaurants, and essential services
- Ideal for a family home or a lucrative investment

.

location: Riffa Al Sharqi, Riffa, Southern Governorate
titel: East Riffa Residential (RB) | 28.2 BHD Per FT
description:
East Riffa is a rapidly developing area in Bahrain, offering a blend of modern amenities and cultural attractions, making it an appealing location for residential investments.

Key Features of East Riffa:

Modern Infrastructure: The area boasts contemporary developments such as Riffa Views, a distinguished residential community featuring a Colin Montgomerie championship golf course, an international school, and state-of-the-art facilities. 

 
This area is known for its strategic location and accessibility to essential services.



Property Details:

* Land Type: Residential (RB)
* Land Size: 594.6 SQM
* Price: BHD 28.2 per FT
* Total Price: BHD 180,000


Landmarks:

- Nearby  Walk Mall
- Easy access to main roads
- Nearby essential services, cafes and restaurants.


Shopping and Entertainment: Residents have access to various shopping venues, including Enma Mall and Lulu Hypermarket Mall. The area also offers a thriving restaurant scene and entertainment options like Iron Man Gym and Gaga Zumba Hop. 

Sports Facilities: The Bahrain National Stadium, located in East Riffa, hosts major sports events and football matches, serving as the national stadium of Bahrain with a capacity of 24,000 spectators. 

Healthcare Services: The area is served by medical facilities such as the Al Rayan Medical Complex Hospital, ensuring residents have access to essential healthcare services. 

Educational Institutions: East Riffa offers educational facilities, including international schools within developments like Riffa Views, catering to the educational needs of residents. 

These features contribute to East Riffa's appeal as a residential area, making it an attractive option for individuals looking to invest in residential land.

- تقع في ارقى مناطق الرفاع
- مساحة الارض: 299.7 متر مربع
- سعر الارض: 105,000دينار 
- التصنيف: سكني RA

منطقة  الرفاع الشمالي تعتبر من أرقى و اهدأ المناطق السكنية في البحرين. تتميز بقربها من مدينة عيسى و الرفاع الشرقي بالإضافة إلى درة البحرين. تقع منطقة الرفاع الشمالي بالقرب من كافة الخدمات مثل المجمعات التجارية و المطاعم والمقاهي و المدارس و السوبرماركت و غيرها. 

أهم المعالم القريبة من الرفاع الشمالي : 

- المدارس الخاصة و الحكومية 
- سوبرماكت رامز في الرفاع 
- مجمع الإنماء 
- مجمع العلوي في سند
- مستشفى السلام الخاصة
- الجامعة الامريكية
- المدرسة الامريكية
- مدرسة الرفاع فيوز

titel: For Sale Residential Land RA | Prime Location
description:
For Sale Residential Land RA in Saar area in Prime Location near the Janabia Square.

Land Size: 353.9  SQM.
Price Per Feet:  BHD 33
Selling Price: BHD 125,700.


Prime Location and Accessibility

Saar offers residents a tranquil atmosphere while maintaining close proximity to Manama, the capital and commercial hub of Bahrain. Its strategic location also provides easy access to the King Fahd Causeway, facilitating convenient travel to Saudi Arabia. ​


Luxurious Residential Options

The area is renowned for its luxurious villas and high-end residential developments. 


Educational Institutions

Saar is home to several esteemed educational institutions, making it particularly attractive to families. Notable schools include St. Christopher's School and the University College of Bahrain. Additionally, the area hosts the British University of Bahrain, established in partnership with the University of Salford

titel: Corner Prime Residential Land in Al Hamla
description:
Residential Land for Sale in a Prime Location in Al-Hamala

A golden opportunity to own a residential land in one of Bahrain’s most vibrant and serene areas. Al-Hamala is known for its strategic location, proximity to essential services, and a perfect blend of modern living and tranquility.

Property Details:
• Land Size: 236.6 sqm.
• Classification: RHA (Residential).
• Price per sqft: BD 28.7
• Total Price: BHD 73,000

Key Features:
• Located on three roads, offering flexible design options and added privacy.
• Perfect for building a luxury villa or a family residence.
• Prime location in Al-Hamala, close to:

	•	Schools and healthcare facilities.
	•	Shopping malls and commercial areas.
	•	Major highways for easy access to all parts of Bahrain.
• Peaceful and family-friendly neighborhood.

Why Choose Al-Hamala?
Al-Hamala is one of Bahrain’s top residential areas, renowned for its charm, proximity to key landmarks, and availability of all essential amenities.

Al-Hamala Area Highlights:
• Strategic Location: Al-Hamala is situated close to key roads and highways, providing easy access to other areas of Bahrain and the King Fahd Causeway to Saudi Arabia.
• Peaceful Environment: The area offers a calm and serene atmosphere, perfect for families seeking a quiet place to live while still being close to essential services.
• Family-Oriented Community: Al-Hamala is known for its family-friendly ambiance with several parks and recreational areas nearby.
• Close to Major Facilities: Residents of Al-Hamala enjoy proximity to reputable schools, hospitals, shopping malls, and supermarkets, ensuring convenience in daily life.
• Green Spaces & Nature: The area has a number of parks and natural surroundings, offering opportunities for outdoor activities and relaxation.
• Growing Infrastructure: With continued development, Al-Hamala is rapidly becoming a highly sought-after residential destination, combining modern infrastructure with a tranquil lifestyle.

titel: Prime Residential Plot for Sale in Hamad Town
description:
Residential Land for Sale in Hamad Town – Prime Location

We are pleased to offer a residential plot situated in the heart of Hamad Town, a well-established community known for its strategic location and comprehensive amenities.

Property Details:
- Land Area: 558.4 square meters
-  Classification: RA (Residential)
- Price per Square Foot: BD 24
- Total Price: BD 144,252

Why Choose Hamad Town?
Hamad Town is a thriving residential area located approximately 18 kilometers from the capital, Manama, and about 19 kilometers from Bahrain International Airport. The town boasts a range of facilities including shopping centers, schools, healthcare services, and recreational parks. Its proximity to major landmarks such as the Bahrain International Circuit and the University of Bahrain in Sakhir adds to its appeal. The area is well-connected by public transportation, making commuting convenient for residents.

This plot offers an excellent opportunity to build a family home in a community that combines comfort, accessibility, and a vibrant lifestyle.

For more information or to schedule a viewing, please contact us at your earliest convenience.

titel: Residential (RA) | 34 BHD Per FT
description:
Saar is a distinguished residential area in Bahrain, located west of the capital, Manama. Known for its lush greenery and tranquil environment, Saar offers a blend of luxury and comfort, making it a sought-after location for both locals and expatriates.

Saar is renowned for its upscale residential properties, including spacious villas and modern apartments. The area is particularly popular among families due to its peaceful ambiance and proximity to essential amenities. The presence of reputable educational institutions, such as St. Christopher's School and the University College of Bahrain, adds to its attractiveness for residents seeking quality education for their children. 

Proximity to El Mercado Mall

Located nearby, El Mercado Mall in Janabiya serves as a convenient shopping and dining destination for Saar residents. This neighborhood market offers a variety of retail outlets, restaurants, and cafes, catering to diverse tastes and preferences. The mall's design harmoniously blends with the local character, providing a comfortable and accessible environment for daily needs and leisure activities.
